segments.text: Yes . I ’ m here to apply for the job of director that your company posted yesterday . Is it still available ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . We ’ ll close this position posting at the end of this month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . Where can I get an application form ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Go to the Human Resource Office , please . You can get it there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where is the Human Resource Office ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s on the first floor , Room 120 .
segments.speaker: S1
